q: Justin Bieber Film A Solid Bid For Credibility by David Letterman Rechtshaffen Setting out to demonstrate that overnight sensations deserve respect too, Justin Bieber should make believers out of all but the most hardened of skeptics with Justin Bieber : Never Say Never, which opens Friday. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.
